verses.verse: And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4033>sojournings<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.

These are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>. <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, being <S%H6240>seventeen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, was <S%H7462>feeding<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> with his <S%H251>brethren<s%>; and he was a <S%H5288>lad<s%> with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%>, and with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%>, his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H802>wives<s%>: and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1681>report<s%> of them unto their <S%H1>father<s%>.

Now <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> more than all his <S%H1121>children<s%>, because he was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of his old <S%H2208>age<s%>: and he <S%H6213>made<s%> him a <S%H3801>coat<s%> of many <S%H6446>colors<s%>.

And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> him more than all his <S%H251>brethren<s%>; and they <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H3201>him<s%>, and could not <S%H1696>speak<s%> peaceably unto <S%H7965>him<s%>.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, and he <S%H5046>told<s%> it to his <S%H251>brethren<s%>: and they <S%H8130>hated<s%> him yet the <S%H3254>more<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8085>them<s%>, Hear, I pray <S%H2472>you<s%>, this dream which I have <S%H2492>dreamed<s%>:

for <S%H481><s%>, behold, we were binding <S%H485>sheaves<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, <S%H485>and<s%>, lo, my sheaf <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and also stood <S%H5324>upright<s%>; <S%H485>and<s%>, behold, your sheaves came round <S%H5437>about<s%>, and made <S%H7812>obeisance<s%> to my <S%H485>sheaf<s%>.

And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4427>him<s%>, Shalt thou indeed <S%H4427>reign<s%> over <S%H4910>us<s%>? or shalt thou indeed have <S%H4910>dominion<s%> over <S%H8130>us<s%>? And they hated him yet the <S%H3254>more<s%> for his <S%H2472>dreams<s%>, and for his <S%H1697>words<s%>.

And he <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> yet <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H2472>dream<s%>, and <S%H5608>told<s%> it to his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H2492>Behold<s%>, I have dreamed yet a <S%H2472>dream<s%>: <S%H8121>and<s%>, behold, the sun and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> and <S%H6240>eleven<s%> <S%H3556>stars<s%> made obeisance to <S%H7812>me<s%>.

And he <S%H5608>told<s%> it to his <S%H1>father<s%>, and to his <S%H251>brethren<s%>; and his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said unto <S%H2472>him<s%>, What is this dream that thou hast <S%H2492>dreamed<s%>? Shall I and thy <S%H517>mother<s%> and thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H935>indeed<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to bow <S%H7812>down<s%> ourselves to thee to the <S%H776>earth<s%>?
And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7065>envied<s%> <S%H1>him<s%>; but his father <S%H8104>kept<s%> the saying in <S%H1697>mind<s%>.
And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7462>feed<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6629>flock<s%> in <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, Are not thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7462>feeding<s%> the flock in <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>? <S%H3212>come<s%>, and I will send <S%H7971>thee<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>. And he said to him, Here am I.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>him<s%>, Go <S%H7200>now<s%>, see whether it is <S%H7965>well<s%> with thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H7965>well<s%> with the <S%H6629>flock<s%>; and <S%H7725>bring<s%> me <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>. So he <S%H7971>sent<s%> him out of the <S%H6010>vale<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, and he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>.

And a certain <S%H376>man<s%> found <S%H4672>him<s%>, <S%H8582>and<s%>, behold, he was wandering in the <S%H7704>field<s%>: and the <S%H376>man<s%> asked <S%H7592>him<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What seekest <S%H1245>thou<s%>?
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I am <S%H1245>seeking<s%> my <S%H251>brethren<s%>: <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H375>me<s%>, I pray thee, where they are feeding the <S%H7462>flock<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, They are <S%H5265>departed<s%> <S%H2088>hence<s%>; for I <S%H8085>heard<s%> them <S%H559>say<s%>, Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H1886>Dothan<s%>. And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H4672>found<s%> them in <S%H1886>Dothan<s%>.
And they <S%H7200>saw<s%> him afar <S%H7350>off<s%>, and before he came <S%H7126>near<s%> unto <S%H5230>them<s%>, they conspired against him to slay <S%H4191>him<s%>.
And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>, <S%H1976>Behold<s%>, this <S%H1167>dreamer<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>.

Come <S%H3212><s%> now <S%H2026>therefore<s%>, and let us slay <S%H7993>him<s%>, and cast him into <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H953>pits<s%>, and we will <S%H559>say<s%>, An <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H7200>him<s%>: and we shall see what will become of his <S%H2472>dreams<s%>.
And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5337>it<s%>, and delivered him out of their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us not take his <S%H5221>life<s%>.

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8210>them<s%>, Shed no <S%H1818>blood<s%>; <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into this <S%H953>pit<s%> that is in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, but <S%H7971>lay<s%> no <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon <S%H5337>him<s%>: that he might deliver him out of their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, to <S%H7725>restore<s%> him to his <S%H1>father<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3130>pass<s%>, when Joseph was <S%H935>come<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, that they stripped <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H854>of<s%> his <S%H3801>coat<s%>, the <S%H3801>coat<s%> <S%H854>of<s%> many colors that was on <S%H6446>him<s%>;
and they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7993>him<s%>, and cast him into the <S%H953>pit<s%>: and the <S%H953>pit<s%> was <S%H7386>empty<s%>, there was no water in <S%H4325>it<s%>.

And they sat <S%H3427>down<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>: and they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H736>and<s%>, behold, a caravan of <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%> was <S%H935>coming<s%> from <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, with their <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> <S%H5219>spicery<s%> and <S%H6875>balm<s%> and <S%H3910>myrrh<s%>, <S%H1980>going<s%> to carry it <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, What <S%H1215>profit<s%> is it if we <S%H2026>slay<s%> our <S%H251>brother<s%> and <S%H3680>conceal<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%>?

Come <S%H3212><s%>, and let us <S%H4376>sell<s%> him to the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%>, and let not our <S%H3027>hand<s%> be upon <S%H251>him<s%>; for he is our brother, our <S%H1320>flesh<s%>. And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> hearkened unto <S%H8085>him<s%>.

And there <S%H5674>passed<s%> by <S%H4084>Midianites<s%>, <S%H582>merchantmen<s%>; and they <S%H4900>drew<s%> and lifted <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> out of the <S%H953>pit<s%>, and <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> to the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%> for <S%H6242>twenty<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%>. And they <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto the <S%H953>pit<s%>; <S%H3130>and<s%>, behold, Joseph was not in the <S%H953>pit<s%>; and he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>.
And he <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3206>child<s%> is <S%H575>not<s%>; and I, whither shall I <S%H935>go<s%>?

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H3801>coat<s%>, and <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H8163>a<s%> <S%H5795>he-goat<s%>, and <S%H2881>dipped<s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%>;

and they <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%> of many <S%H6446>colors<s%>, and they <S%H935>brought<s%> it to their <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, This have we <S%H4672>found<s%>: <S%H5234>know<s%> now whether it is thy <S%H1121>son<s%>'s coat or <S%H3801>not<s%>.

And he knew <S%H5234>it<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, It is my <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H3801>coat<s%>; an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H3130>him<s%>; Joseph is without <S%H2963>doubt<s%> torn in <S%H2963>pieces<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H8071>garments<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> upon his <S%H4975>loins<s%>, and <S%H56>mourned<s%> for his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And all his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and all his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> <S%H3985>him<s%>; but he refused to be <S%H5162>comforted<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%>, For I will go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> to my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H57>mourning<s%>. And his <S%H1>father<s%> wept for <S%H1058>him<s%>.

And the <S%H4092>Midianites<s%> <S%H4376>sold<s%> him into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto <S%H6318>Potiphar<s%>, an <S%H5631>officer<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s, the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%>.
